beers.notes: Notes of banana nut bread, frosted cereal, sticky toffee pudding, and 23 different flavors.
beers.beer: Cask- Sir Dudley Banana French Toast
beers.description: Dark Mild. 4.2% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Gently hopped with UK First Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Conditioned on gobs of banana puree and Tahitian vanilla beans, cinnamon sticks, and sticky Pennsylvania Grade B maple syrup.
beers.summary:
Dark Mild. 4.2% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts. Gently hopped with UK First Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Conditioned on gobs of banana puree and Tahitian vanilla beans, cinnamon sticks, and sticky Pennsylvania Grade B maple syrup.
Notes of banana nut bread, frosted cereal, sticky toffee pudding, and 23 different flavors.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of bakers chocolate, black walnut, light wood smoke, and sticky toffee.
beers.beer: More Grisly Than Ever In Blood Color
beers.description: Imperial Squash Porter. 8.5% Brewed with a plethora of specialty and roasted malts, local wildflower honey, and house roasted butternut squash from Lancaster. Gently hopped in the kettle with UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast.
beers.summary:
Imperial Squash Porter. 8.5% Brewed with a plethora of specialty and roasted malts, local wildflower honey, and house roasted butternut squash from Lancaster. Gently hopped in the kettle with UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast.
Notes of bakers chocolate, black walnut, light wood smoke, and sticky toffee.

beers.notes: Notes of bursting kiwi, guava smoothie, strawberry, and dried apricot.
beers.description: Local Malt IPA. 6.66% Brewed with Proximity malt and a dash of pilsner. Solely hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe. Dry hopped with an embarrassing amount of Jeans hand selected Nelson Sauvin and Pacific Jade from New Zealand.
beers.summary:
Local Malt IPA. 6.66% Brewed with Proximity malt and a dash of pilsner. Solely hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe. Dry hopped with an embarrassing amount of Jeans hand selected Nelson Sauvin and Pacific Jade from New Zealand.
Notes of bursting kiwi, guava smoothie, strawberry, and dried apricot.

beers.notes: Notes of bursting kiwi, guava smoothie, strawberry, and dried apricot.
beers.description: Hay and Spicebush Saison. 5.1% Brewed with oats, foraged spicebush from Jeans farm and alfalfa hay. Gently hopped in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented in stainless with our magickal saison yeast.
beers.summary:
Hay and Spicebush Saison. 5.1% Brewed with oats, foraged spicebush from Jeans farm and alfalfa hay. Gently hopped in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented in stainless with our magickal saison yeast.
Notes of bursting kiwi, guava smoothie, strawberry, and dried apricot.

beers.notes: Notes of blueberry scone, fresh linen, cranberry reduction, and brisk prosecco.
beers.description: Tiny IPA 3.5% Brewed with 100% raw barley that was grown in our spent grain by our dear comrades at Two Particular Acres. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Dry hopped with an embarrassing amount of German Cascade and Motueka.
beers.summary:
Tiny IPA 3.5% Brewed with 100% raw barley that was grown in our spent grain by our dear comrades at Two Particular Acres. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Dry hopped with an embarrassing amount of German Cascade and Motueka.
Notes of blueberry scone, fresh linen, cranberry reduction, and brisk prosecco.

beers.notes: Notes of candied yams, crisp fall evenings, clove cookies, and hard toffee candies.
beers.description: Sweet Potato Fest Bier. 5.8% Brewed with Munich and Crystal malts and a whole lot of Lancaster County sweet potatoes. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Fermented in stainless at cool temperatures with our house ale yeast.
beers.summary:
Sweet Potato Fest Bier. 5.8% Brewed with Munich and Crystal malts and a whole lot of Lancaster County sweet potatoes. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Fermented in stainless at cool temperatures with our house ale yeast.
Notes of candied yams, crisp fall evenings, clove cookies, and hard toffee candies.

beers.notes: Notes of maraschino cherries, awake minds coffee, blackcap raspberry, and cocoa powder.
beers.description: Zinfandel Grape Imperial Stout. 11.4% Brewed with oats and a plethora of specialty malts. Primary fermentation in stainless upon mountains of hand crushed Zinfandel grapes. The result is a complex and luscious reimagining of one of our most dark and devastating beers. No more hope. No more dawn. Only void.
beers.summary:
Zinfandel Grape Imperial Stout. 11.4% Brewed with oats and a plethora of specialty malts. Primary fermentation in stainless upon mountains of hand crushed Zinfandel grapes. The result is a complex and luscious reimagining of one of our most dark and devastating beers. No more hope. No more dawn. Only void.
Notes of maraschino cherries, awake minds coffee, blackcap raspberry, and cocoa powder.
